subject: Order Declined?
description_text:
Hi there!

I placed an order through your website for the Simmson Plus X Racing
Simulation package on Friday (12/12), but I just received a delayed text
message from my credit card provider saying the payment bounced back due to
an error in entering some card information. However, the message reflecting
the declined charge is for a total of $317.30, but the amount showing up in
my banking app is $297.30. Because of the slight difference, I want to
verify that there is no existing order under my phone number/billing
address. I will submit a new order if you are unable to find anything on
your end.

I remember inputting my phone number into Shopify, but I’m not certain
which email address was used for the order.

If there is an existing order, it should be under this information:

Phone Number: (714) 345-5518
Name: Emily Higgins
Shipping/Billing Address: 2850 Kelvin Ave, Apt. 417, Irvine CA 92614


Thank you in advance for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Emily Higgins,    Your order number is #SSN4730. Your order has been shipped and delivered. Please confirm.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ201H40335423033/trackdetails

Yes, I have received the package — thank you!
